Hello,

I have a question.

How many memory for one crawl job.
My crawl is stoped with OutOfMemoryError, and Web UI is not work well.

I created 4-5 jobs based on basic_seed_sites profile, and run these.

I am using heritrix 2.0.2 with JAVA_OPTS=-Xmx1000m.
Is it not enough?

takeru
